metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13638 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: GNU patch through 2.7.6 is vulnerable to OS shell command injection thatcan be exploited by opening a crafted patch file that contains an ed stylediff payload with shell metacharacters. The ed editor does not need to bepresent on the vulnerable system. This is different from CVE-2018-1000156.

criterions.comment: patch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
